name: Debtors Report
query:
SELECT	si.name AS "Invoice No:Link/Sales Invoice:150",
	si.cost_center AS "Cost Center:Link/Cost Center:180",
	si.customer	AS "Customer:Link/Customer:150",
	si.lease_item AS "Lease Item:Link/Item:100",
	si.from_date AS "From Date:Date:100",
	si.to_date AS "To Date:Date:100",
	si.due_date AS "Due Date:Date:100",
	FORMAT(IF(si.currency = "USD", IF (si.currency = si.party_account_currency, si.outstanding_amount, si.outstanding_amount/si.conversion_rate), ""),2) AS "Outstanding USD::100",
	FORMAT(IF(si.currency = "TZS", IF (si.currency = si.party_account_currency, si.outstanding_amount, si.outstanding_amount), ""),2) AS "Outstanding TZS::100",
    _user_tags as "Remarks"
FROM	`tabSales Invoice` si
WHERE si.status IN ("Sumitted", "Unpaid", "Overdue")
